entry.title: New release for AdGuardHome Sync: v0.7.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 327d67c9ef5b7b939f74c87dd93cb697a120a542 build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.35.0 to 0.36.0 (#519)
  • 54d98c10fedb15bdd927e5d1bc10e55f66467d76 extend print config comments #507
  • 8ef1eb8c2aaf6fa11bfcccd05c38b75e72dd5aec feat: print runtime info in config only mode
  • 32c728ccf85bb66b1e208d796cbb4e33441620c4 fix: handle small passwords in mask function #522 (#523)
